definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: You should sing according to my drumbeats, otherwise, there would be no order.
sentences.chinese: 打的鼓点开口，否则就没有板眼了。

sentences.english: Joyful songs are still around our ears, cheerful drums are still in our hearts.
sentences.chinese: 愉悦的歌声还回荡在耳畔，快乐的鼓点还奏响在心中。

sentences.english: Don't ever let them hear drums and percussions.
sentences.chinese: 不要让他们听见鼓点和旋律。

sentences.english: And I also like the drum beat along with the dance feel to the song.
sentences.chinese: 并且我也非常喜欢跳着舞去感受整首歌的鼓点。

sentences.english: Lei Mingfeng dancing to drum beat made a conquest of Zhuo Luoyu for his pas.
sentences.chinese: 踩着鼓点跳舞的雷鸣凤用他的舞蹈征服了卓洛宇。

sentences.english: I could feel my heart beating like drumbeats.
sentences.chinese: 我感到自己的心房急如鼓点。

sentences.english: Marching to the same beat, playing from the same drum.
sentences.chinese: 打著相同的节拍，踩着相同的鼓点。

sentences.english: Girls in holiday dress dance to the accompaniment of drums.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们身着节日盛装，应着木鼓鼓点翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: Its strong indigenous drums , the people easily accept the inheritance of characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 其鼓点本土性强，群众易接受传承的特征。

sentences.english: The drummer had a pretty tight snare sound, and nice articulation.
sentences.chinese: 这个鼓手的特点是军鼓的声音很紧，鼓点清晰。

sentences.english: Listen to music that has great drumming.
sentences.chinese: 听那些有很棒的鼓点的音乐。

sentences.english: They are dressed in beautiful costumes, skipping back and forth to the rhythm of loud drums.
sentences.chinese: 他们身着漂亮的服装，和着鼓点，扭来扭去。
